name: Challenge to Royal Guard
description:
Challenge to Royal Guard

ある日、ヤドカリの元に一通の手紙が届く
なんとそれはUndyneからの挑戦状だった！
クレイジーなコウモリの攻撃を3分間凌ぎ、Royal Guardの一員となろう！

One day you receive a mail from Undyne. It was a challenge from her!
Survive from a crazy bat for more than 3minutes. Prove your determination to
become a member of Royal Guard.

Description:

Challenge to Royal Guard is a undertale fan game, I created for my one week challenge. There are a lot bugs, however I can't fix it due to my spaghetti code. So... sorry about it .-.

CONTROLS:

Any key: move forward

Space(press and hold) : swap to shield

Arrow Keys : movement

操作方法:

全てのキー: 先に進む

矢印キー: 移動

スペース(長押し): シールドに持ち替える

CREDITS:

Sprites: https://goglilol.itch.io/cute-knight
Tile-sets: https://goglilol.itch.io/cute-knight

Music:  by Toby Fox
